query:
SELECT 
  productType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_desc,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_categories pc WHERE pc.productId = p.id) as total_categorized
FROM products p
GROUP BY productType
ORDER BY count DESC;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3oR8r6zhvNA54kM.root --database 7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG --execute SELECT 
  productType,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  SUM(CASE WHEN description IS NOT NULL AND description != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_desc,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_categories pc WHERE pc.productId = p.id) as total_categorized
FROM products p
GROUP BY productType
ORDER BY count DESC;
